lyrics:
4 contributorsbelief lyricsverse 1
belief makes things real
makes things feel feel alright
belief makes things true
things like you you and i

chorus
tonight you arrested my mind
when you came to my defense
with a knife in the shape of your mouth
in the form of your body with the wrath of a god
oh you stood by me

verse 2
belief builds from scratch
doesnt have to relax it doesnt need space
long live the queen and ill be the king
in the color of grace

chorus
oh tonight you arrested my mind
when you came to my defense
with a knife in the shape of your mouth
in the form of your body with the wrath of a god
oh you stood by me belief
see gavin degraw liveget tickets as low as 53you might also likebridge
im gonna yell it from the rooftops
ill wear a sign on my chest
thats the least i can do its the least i can do

chorus
tonight you arrested my mind
when you came to my defense
with a knife in the shape of your mouth
in the form of your body with the wrath of a god
oh you stood by me
tonight you arrested my mind
when you came to my defense
with a knife in the shape of your mouth
in the form of your body with the wrath of a god
oh you stood by me and ill stand by my belief

i will stand by my
i will stand by my
